text: Wesley Charles Vandervoort (May 3, 1926 – September 3, 1993) was an American race car driverWes Vandervoort. Retrieved May 5, 2020.Wesley Charles Vandervoort Retrieved May 5, 2020. from Colorado Springs, Colorado. He won the Pikes Peak International Hill ClimbThe Pikes Peak International Hill Climb, still growing after 96 years. Retrieved May 5, 2020. in 1967,PPIHC All Time Kings of the Mountain (1916-2018). Retrieved May 5, 2020. when he was part of the USAC Championship Car. Vandervoort has a total of 5 USAC Championship races between 1965 and 1969.USAC Champ Car Series Statistics.
